title: Cannot login
body:
# Bug Report

## Description

Cannot login anymore. Getting "incorrect password" when I know it's correct (using a password manager).


Logs:

```
â–¶ ~/.local/bin/StatusIm-Desktop-230821-200320-7274e6-x86_64.AppImage
INFO [08-22|16:53:26.189] Status backend initialized               backend=geth version=0.163.11 commit=3bf0bed78 IpfsGatewayURL=https://ipfs.status.im/
Info: Warning: Ignoring XDG_SESSION_TYPE=wayland on Gnome. Use QT_QPA_PLATFORM=wayland to run on Wayland anyway. (:0, )
INF 2023-08-22 16:53:27.438+10:00 Version: 0.9.90                            topics="status-app" tid=103272 file=nim_status_client.nim:189
INF 2023-08-22 16:53:27.439+10:00 Commit: 7274e6156                          topics="status-app" tid=103272 file=nim_status_client.nim:190
INF 2023-08-22 16:53:27.439+10:00 Current date:                              topics="status-app" tid=103272 file=nim_status_client.nim:191 currentDateTime=2023-08-22T16:53:27+10:00
INF 2023-08-22 16:53:27.439+10:00 starting application controller...         topics="status-app" tid=103272 file=nim_status_client.nim:193
INF 2023-08-22 16:53:36.595+10:00 starting application...                    topics="status-app" tid=103272 file=nim_status_client.nim:196
WRN 2023-08-22 16:53:36.596+10:00 Error decoding signal                      topics="signals-manager" tid=103272 file=signals_manager.nim:43 err="Unknown signal received: mediaserver.started"
Debug: Network Cache Dir:  "/home/fryorcraken/.config/Status/tmp/netcache" (:0, )
Warning: QQuickItem::stackBefore: Cannot stack AccountMenuItemPanel_QMLTYPE_484(0x559f34e39010, parent=0x559f34ba1cd0, geometry=0,0 342x64) before AccountMenuItemPanel_QMLTYPE_484(0x559f349e9100, name = "LoginView_addNewUserItem"), which must be a sibling (:0, )
ERROR[08-22|16:53:45.816] failed to initialize wallet db           package=status-go/api.GethStatusBackend err="failed to set `journal_mode` pragma: file is not a database"
failed to set `journal_mode` pragma: file is not a database
ERR 2023-08-22 16:53:45.816+10:00 error:                                     topics="accounts-service" tid=103272 file=service.nim:619 procName=verifyDatabasePassword errDesription="failed to set `journal_mode` pragma: file is not a database"
ERROR[08-22|16:53:48.348] failed to initialize wallet db           package=status-go/api.GethStatusBackend err="failed to set `journal_mode` pragma: file is not a database"
ERROR[08-22|16:53:48.348] failed to start a node                   key-uid=0x74c9c15fe362623c55226f9ba674fd9cca46f83c280a0fd75a7d256b0639a390 error="failed to set `journal_mode` pragma: file is not a database"
ERR 2023-08-22 16:53:48.348+10:00 node.login                                 topics="signals-manager" tid=103272 file=signals_manager.nim:48 error="failed to set `journal_mode` pragma: file is not a database"
ERR 2023-08-22 16:53:48.352+10:00 login error                                topics="app-controller" tid=103272 file=module.nim:436 methodName=onNodeLogin errDesription="failed to set `journal_mode` pragma: file is not a database"

```


### Additional Information

- Status desktop version: StatusIm-Desktop-230821-200320-7274e6-x86_64.AppImage
- Operating System: Fedora Linux
I backed up and deleted  `~/.config/Status` folder to help resort but when initiating the account, it does not find any profile messages on the network.
